[link del reglamento OFICIAL](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/) [link del reglamento traducido al español](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/translations/spanish-european/) Y como dice un viejo dicho, a cubear se ha dicho! For new competitors, there will be a small tutorial on how to compete, how to use the timers, how penalties work, etc. Please familiarize yourself with the rules for more knowledge of the competition and how they are run. [Official Regulation Link](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/) And as a saying goes, I always scramble cube that she/he does.

name: Arnold Classic Africa 2018
information: ### General Information This competition will take place as part of the Arnold Classic Sport Festival. Please note that the venue will probably be quite noisy. ### Payment Competitors who register on the WCA website at least 14 days before the competition will be granted free access to the expo and will only have to pay the competition entry fee. The entrance fee is R 100 at the competition or R 85 if paid online in advance. Please see the [Payment Information](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/ArnoldClassicAfrica2018#3955-payment-information) tab for details. ### Volunteering If you would like to volunteer to help staff at the competition, please contact one of the WCA delegates. Please state which dates and times you will be available. Volunteer schedules will be drawn up so that they don't clash with your competing.
venueAddress: 161 Maude St, Sandown, Sandton, 2031, South Africa

name: Arnold Classic North America 2019
information: This competition will take place as part of the Arnold Classic Kids and Teen Expo which is held during the Arnold Classic Sports Festival. There are over 80 competitive events across 155,000 square feet in both Expo Centers. More information about this event can be found [here](https://www.arnoldsportsfestival.com/the-arnold/fitnessexpo/) Please note that the venue will probably be quite noisy at times. All competitors who register for this competition will get free entry to the Arnold Kids and Teen Expo, wristbands/ticket will be available to pick up at Will Call. However, all spectators over the age of 14 WILL BE required to purchase a ticket/wristband for the Arnold Sports Festival Kids and Teen Expo. There are single day passes as well as weekend passes available. Information about ticket purchases can be found [here](https://www.arnoldsportsfestival.com/tickets/) Tickets can be purchased for just the Kids and Teen Expo as well as upgraded tickets for both the Kids and Teen Expo along with the Arnold Sports Expo. There will also be a $10 fee per car for parking and information about that can be found [here](https://www.arnoldsportsfestival.com/visitor-info/parking-and-transportation/) There is free shuttle between the Kids and Teen Expo and the Sports Expo. IF you have any questions at all about this competition in terms of registration costs, tickets, parking, or anything else, please contact us before registering!
venue: Ohio Expo Center - Ohio State Fair

name: Auckland Spring 2018
information: Auckland Spring 2018 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the 3x3x3 Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. Entry is free for spectators, no registration required. Competitors must register and pay a registration fee, see the registration page for more details. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the day on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.

INSCRIPCION HASTA QUE SE COMPLETEN LOS 80 CUPOS O HASTA QUE SE TERMINE LA INSCRIPCION EL 13 DE ENERO

name: Aventura Cúbica VII 2019
information: Este torneo es la séptima edición del Aventura Cúbica. Los resultados de este torneo ingresarán a la base de datos y al ranking de la WCA, y quienes participen por primera vez adquirirán un perfil oficial. Por esa razón, todos los competidores deben conocer el reglamento de la WCA. REGISTRO: Se debe realizar el pago en la tienda TCG (The Cube Girls) de Lima, ubicada en Galería Brasil, Av. Brasil 1275, interior 66-A, Jesús María (http://thecubegirls.com/index.php/tiendas). Cada competidor debe elegir los eventos en los que se va a inscribir cuidadosamente luego de revisar la pestaña “Horario" (Schedule). Prestar atención a los formatos de cada ronda y a sus respectivos cortes y límites detallados en la pestaña “Categorías” (Events). Es importante escribir cuidadosamente los nombres, fecha de nacimiento o demás datos. En caso de no hacerlo de la manera correcta, serán rechazados. Para competidores que participan por segunda vez es necesario que hayan reclamado su WCA ID. *Los competidores que vengan de fuera de Lima deberán comunicarse y coordinar la forma de pago con el organizador, Alexander Esquivel CEL: 982527214. El registro permanecerá abierto mientras no se alcance el límite de competidores. Sin embargo, solo tendrán derecho a recibir polo quienes completen su registro (inscripción y pago) antes del 02 de febrero.
venueDetails: 3er Piso, Frente al patio de comidas

name: Avenues Rubik's Cube Open 2017
information: **New Participants** Step 1 - Sign-up on WCA Step 2 - Register for the competition Step 3 - Pay according to the procedure mentioned in the [registrations&payments tab](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/AvenuesRubiksCubeOpen2017#2380-registrations-payments). **Returning participants** Step 1 - Sign-in using your email that you used for your previous competitions. Step 2 - Register for the competition. Step 3 - Pay according to the procedure mentioned in the [registrations&payments tab](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/AvenuesRubiksCubeOpen2017#2380-registrations-payments). Registration for the event will only be accepted **if a person has preregistered on the WCA page AND made the payment**. For more details on the registration process please check the [registrations&payments tab](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/AvenuesRubiksCubeOpen2017#2380-registrations-payments). For the competition Schedule please check the [schedule tab](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/AvenuesRubiksCubeOpen2017#2381-schedule).

name: Ayase 2019
information: 東京，綾瀬駅より徒歩3分の足立区勤労福祉会館にて，ルービックキューブの公式大会を開催します。 開催種目は， 　・3x3x3 キューブ　4ラウンド 　・2x2x2 キューブ　2ラウンド 　・3x3x3 片手　　　2ラウンド 　・3x3x3 目隠し　　1ラウンド の4種目となります。特に3x3x3キューブは記録更新のチャンス，ぜひご参加ください。 ※3x3x3キューブの参加者数が100人に満たない場合，3ラウンド開催となります。 WCA official competition is held near Ayase Sta. in Tokyo. We have * 4 rounds for 3x3x3 * 2 rounds for 2x2x2, 3x3x3 one-handed * 1 round for 3x3x3 blindfolded as its events. It is chance to break your record especially in 3x3x3! Let's come to our competition to take a chance! ※3x3x3 will be 3 rounds if the number of competitors for the event is less than 100.

information: Any requested changes to registration before the deadline will be honored. Your registration is not complete until your name shows up on the list. If it is before registration has closed, you are eligible for a refund for half of your fee. There are multiple food options nearby where competitors will be able to get food. The registration fee will be $25 per competitor and there is a competitor limit of 150. Registration will close on May 6th, 2017. Competitors MUST register and pay online in order to compete. No at-the-door registrations or payments will be accepted. ALL SPECTATORS ARE WELCOME TO ATTEND FOR FREE. CubeDepot will be vending and supplying prizes for the winners.

The main event for the competition is 5x5. 5x5 Winner will be declared the winner of Big Cube Bonanza 2018.

name: Bulldog Cubing 2017
information: There is a registration fee of $10 There is a limit of 120 competitors This competition is open to everyone and spectators may attend for free. The competition will take place in the cafeteria. Parking will be availaible at the school. Regsitration will be done through the WCA website. Once you have submitted your registration, it will be manually approved by the orginization team. Because of this, please allow 48 hours for us to approve your registration before contacting us. *Registration on the WCA website must be manually approved. Please allow up to 48 hours after payment for us to approve your registration before contacting us. * This competition is recognized as an official World Cube Association competition. Therefore, all competitors must be familiar with the[ WCA regulations ](http://worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/) If you would like an in depth tutorial of what it is like when competing, please watch [this video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dPL3eV-A0ww). Shoutout to Chris Olson for such an awesome tutorial. [CubingUSA's Competitor Tutorial.](http://www.cubingusa.com/ctutorial.php) Prizes for this competition are supplied by thecubicle.us

name: Capital Cube 2017
information: Capital Cube 2017 will be the second tournament of this year, starting this 2017 year willing to make Speed Cubing community grow in Venezuela, invinting new people to join this great and big world, using the Rubik's Cube fame and people's curiosity about learning to solve it, developing mental strength, dextery and talent we all have... The reason for this tournament is to let the people know abous our Caracas community to help us grow... The tournament will be held on a very good space with good lights with several chairs and tables to set up the event, with good temperature, sound and all we need to handle the event and make upcoming tournament possible and better, the schedule its focused on new people and to be realized in a good and calm way so we end every puzzle competition on time, we will held 7 categories: 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 3x3 OH, Pyraminx and Rubik's Clock, the current Rubik's Clock SAR holder will join us and other current National Holder Records, the final point is to have a good tournament and set ground for the next. Torneo Capital Cube 2017 será el segundo torneo del año de Venezuela, empezando este 2017 con ansias de hacer crecer el Speed Cubing en Venezuela invitando a gente nueva para que se una a este grande y genial mundo, aprovechando la fama de los cubos de rubik y la curiosidad de la gente por aprender, y desarrollar la habilidad mental, destreza y el talento escondido que todos tenemos... La finalidad de este torneo es principalmente para darnos a conocer un poco más en el país y hacer que crezca la comunidad... El lugar de el evento será una sala bastante espaciosa e iluminada que contará con numerosas mesas y sillas para los competidores, con aire acondicionado, micrófono y todo lo necesario para hacer de este evento un buen abre boca para los que se vienen en el transcurso de el año, el cronograma está pensado para que todas las categorías se realicen de una forma calmada y ordenada para que el evento termine en el a la hora determinada y sin contratiempos, serán siete categorías: 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, OH,Pyraminx & Clock y contaremos con la presencia de el SAR de clock, y otros participantes con NR actuales, la idea es que todo salga perfectamente y este torneo sea solo una base para torneos mucho más grandes.
venueAddress: EDIFICIO SUD BARRIO URDANETA, Caracas, La Candelaria, sqna ferrenquín
venueDetails: Close to "Parque Carabobo" Metro Station follow the road to the building "SUD"

name: Capivara Sunrise 2019
information: **PORTUGUESE** A competição é reconhecida pela Associação Mundial de Cubo Mágico (WCA) e os resultados farão parte dos rankings oficiais. Teremos premiações (medalhas) para os três primeiros colocados de cada modalidade. Contamos com a colaboração de TODOS para tornar a competição mais fluida. Portanto, quando solicitado, prontifique-se para ser juiz, embaralhador ou runner. **ENGLISH** The competitions is aknowledged by the World Cube Association (WCA) and the results will be ranked officially. There will be prizes (medals) for the first three best results in each event. We count on EVERYBODY's collaboration to make this competition more fluid. Therefore, when asked, please be ready to be a judge, scrambler or runner.

information: The registration fee will be $21 per competitor and there is a competitor limit of 130. Registration will open on March 9th, 2017 at 6pm CST, and will close on June 17th, 2017 or when the competitor limit is reached. Competitors MUST register and pay online in order to compete. No at-the-door registrations or payments will be accepted. ALL SPECTATORS ARE WELCOME TO ATTEND FOR FREE. At-door registration will be accepted from 8:00 am until 12:30 pm on the day of the competition, until the competitor limit of 130 is reached (eg. there are 16 at-door spots available). The at-door registration fee is $25. Competitors must register a minimum of 15 minutes before the earliest event they wish to compete in.

information: **Clock is the main event of this competition**, the winners of clock will be announced as the winners of the competition. If you are thinking about registering, but feel the cutoffs are too strict, go ahead and register, and let the organization team know; we may be more lenient and adjust the cutoffs depending on the turnout. To register, please follow all Instructions on the registration payment tab. Inproper completion of these steps may result in a delay of Registration. If you do not see your name on the compeitors tab after 48 hours of registering, please contact the organizers to resolve the issue.

name: Chambéry Cube Open 2016
information: The registration is free, maximum number of competitors is 130. Please give us as soon as possible the exact number of guests coming with you **and their names.** There is a restriction on the registration to the following events, you can only chose 3 out of these 6 events : - 6x6 cube; - 7x7 cube; - Rubik's Clock; - 4x4 blindfolded; - 5x5 blindfolded, - 3x3 multiple blindfolded. If you register for more than 3 of these events, your registration may be deleted if you don't answer us. Due to venue restriction we expect the maximum number of competitors to be reached. If this number is reached, and since the competition is free, we will ask you to confirm your registration some weeks before the competition. If you don't answer this email your registration may be deleted. Please register only if you are sure to come: keep in mind that not showing up to the competition may prevent someone else from competing!

name: Champagne Open 2017
information: Maximum number of competitors / Nombre maximum de compétiteurs : 100. The competition is free but an attendance guarantee is asked. It will be integraly restored if : - you participate at least to one event ; - you don't want to participate and you inform us at least 48 hours before the competition. If you don't pay via internet, please ask to the organization team. / La compétition est gratuite mais une caution est demandée comme garantie de présence. Elle sera intégralement restituée dans deux cas : - si l'inscription est honorée : présence à la compétition, à au moins une épreuve ; - ou si nous sommes prévenus de l'absence au moins 48h avant le début de la compétition, pour pouvoir redistribuer la place libérée. Pour payer autrement qu'en ligne, s'adresser directement à l'équipe d'organisation. Qiyi sponsors the competition and will provide awards for the various podiums Qiyi sponsorise la compétition et va fournir des récompenses pour les différents podiums

name: ChicaGhosts 2017
information: Registration Fee: Any requested changes to registration before the deadline will be honored. Your registration is not complete until your name shows up on the list. If you believe you paid and your name isn't showing up, please contact us and we will work it out. If you have registered and are no longer able to attend, please contact us. If it is before October 21st, you are eligible for a refund for half of your fee on the condition that there is someone on the waitlist willing to take your spot. Attempting to file a chargeback for the registration fee will lead to being blacklisted from future WCA events. The registration fee will be $25 per competitor and there is a competitor limit of 175. Registration will open on July 23rd, 2017 at 7pm CST, and will close on October 21st, 2017 or when the competitor limit is reached. Competitors MUST register and pay online in order to compete. No at-the-door registrations or payments will be accepted. ALL SPECTATORS ARE WELCOME TO ATTEND FOR FREE.

[Regla 1e2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#1e2) [Regla 1f2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#1f2) Each competitor must be familiar with and understand the WCA Regulations before the competition. [Rule 2a2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#2t) Every competitor must be available for judging, scrambling, running or score taking. Penalty: disqualification from the competition. [Rule 1e2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#1e2) [Rule 1f2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#1f2) ![Image description](https://i.imgur.com/3uHXclK.jpg)

name: Copper Country Cubing 2019
information: This will be the first ever Michigan UP competition! The Memorial Union Building (MUB) is located between the middle and west end of the Michigan Tech campus. We are excited to announce that in conjunction with this competition, Sydney Weaver and the Cubing Club at Michigan Tech will be hosting a cubing workshop, the Houghton Rubik's Rumble! Check out the [Workshop Info](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/CopperCountryCubing2019#9666-workshop-info) tab to learn about this event.

name: Crossroads Cubing 2017
information: The registration fee is $15. There is a 70 person competitor limit with no at-the-door registration. Your registration is not complete until you pay. You will be placed on a waiting list until you pay. With the WCA system, registration must be manually checked before approval, so please allow up to 48 hours to be moved from the waiting list. We will be holding 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 6x6, OH, Pyra, Clock, and Kilominx.

name: Cross-strait Cubing Exchange 2018
information: The 5th Cross-straiting Cubing Competition is coming! The competition aims to promote the cubers' close communication in the "Greater China area". International cubers are most welcomed to join, to make the competition more fun with us. The competitors are limited to 300 competitors, based on a first-come-first-serve rule. For Chinese domestic participants, a completed registration is online registration plus prepaid registration fee. For oversea participants, if you can't pay the fee online, pls contact the delegate after registration. Then we will make a reservation for you and you can pay the fee by cash on-the-site. Please check the competition website for registration and the other information.

name: Cube Weekend St. Michielsgestel 2018
information: Kubusweekend in St.Michielsgestel, van vrijdagavond 23 t/m zondag 25 maart 2018. Een compleet weekend met 2 overnachtingen, maaltijden, snacks en natuurlijk een wedstrijd. 40-84 deelnemers. Kosten 100 euro. Lees vóór je aanmelding de uitgebreide informatie op http://www.kubuswedstrijden.nl/kubusweekend-st-michielsgestel/ Cube weekend in St. Michielsgestel from Friday evening 23 to Sunday 25 March 2018. A complete weekend with 2 overnight stays, meals, snacks and the competition. 40-84 participants. Costs 100 euros. Before you register, please read the detailed information on http://www.kubuswedstrijden.nl/kubusweekend-st-michielsgestel/

name: Cube Weekend Sint Michielsgestel 2019
information: Een compleet weekend met 2 overnachtingen, maaltijden, snacks en natuurlijk een vol wedstrijdprogramma. Lees vóór je aanmelding de uitgebreide informatie op de website van [Speedcubing Nederland](http://www.kubuswedstrijden.nl/kubusweekend2019). Er is een beperkt aantal bedden voor gasten. Gasten betalen dezelfde prijs als deelnemers. Het is mogelijk om de wedstrijd bij te wonen als bezoeker, maar alle bezoekers moeten worden aangemeld. Bezoekers betalen geen bijdrage, maar kunnen geen gebruik maken van het eten en drinken. A complete weekend with 2 overnight stays, meals, snacks and a complete competition programma. Before you register, please read the detailed information on the website of [Speedcubing Nederland](http://www.kubuswedstrijden.nl/kubusweekend2019). There is a limited number of beds available for guests. Guests will pay the same price as competitors. It is possible to visit the competition as a visitor during the events, but all visitors must be registered. Visitors will not pay a fee, but cannot use the food and drinks.

Cubing in the Redwoods t-shirts will be for sale for $22.

Tjek rejseplanen.dk Regelsæt Denne konkurrence følger WCA regelsættet, det er derfor forventet at alle deltager er bekendt med dette. Alle deltagere er derfor også underforstået med at deres resultater vil blive publiceret på WCA's hjemmeside, inklusiv navn, nationalitet og køn. Betalingspolitik Aflysning: Hvis du tilmelder dig konkurrencen, men du ikke kan komme og du informerer os via e-mail, før den 3. juni, 2016 vil vi overføre halvdelen af ​​den betalte afgift tilbage. Redigering af registrering: tilføje events: Skriv en mail med hvilke events du vil tilføje før 3. juni 2016. Redigering registrering: fjerne events: Skriv en mail med hvilke events du vil fjernes fra før 3. juni 2016. Registreringer uden betalinger: De registreringer uden betaling, vil blive slettet efter tilmeldingsfristen. (3. juni 2016.) Acceptering af registreringer: Vi betragter en registrering for gyldig, når registreringen er færdig, og tilmeldingsgebyret er betalt. Vi vil først acceptere tilmeldingen efter begge disse betingelser er opfyldt. Overnatning Plads til 70 personer til overnatning på venue. Det er først til mølle princippet, og det er gratis. Kontakt Camilla (fam.nielsson@gmail.com ) Indkvartering kan fra fredag aften. Man kan overnatte fra fredag til søndag.

Max competitors : 35.

information: The limitation is 170 participants, based on a first-come-first-serve rule. For oversea participants, if you can't pay the fee online via Alipay, pls contact the delegate. Then we will make a reservation for you by manually accepting your registration and you can pay the fee by cash at the venue. Please check the competition website for registration and the other information.

name: Don't Peek 2018
information: This competition is focused on the BLD, fewest moves and big cube events. **Keep in mind that you need to stay quiet during the BLD events to not disturb the competitors. If you're participating in the competition you are expected to help out with judging, scrambling, running etc. to keep the competition running smoothly.** Spectators are welcome though most of the event that are held are pretty long and boring to watch. There will be a competitor limit of 40 persons and the entry fee is set to 50 SEK. Check out the other tabs for more details.

name: Elk Cubing 2018
information: Registration Fee: Any requested changes to registration before the deadline will be honored. Your registration is not complete until your name shows up on the list. If you believe you paid and your name isn't showing up, please contact us and we will work it out. If you have registered and are no longer able to attend, please contact us. If it is before March 3rd, you are eligible for a full refund of your fee on the condition that there is someone on the waitlist willing to take your spot. Attempting to file a chargeback for the registration fee will lead to being blacklisted from future WCA events. After March 11th you will only receive half of your registration fee for canceling. The registration fee will be $20 per competitor and there is a competitor limit of 150. Registration will open on Feb 7th at 12pm CST, and will close on March 11th, 2018 or when the competitor limit is reached. Competitors MUST register and pay online in order to compete. No at-the-door registrations or payments will be accepted. ALL SPECTATORS ARE WELCOME TO ATTEND FOR FREE. Guests have a $10 lunch fee. Paid with registration. There will be limited sign-ups for lunch the day of CASH ONLY, but the more that pay with registration the better. Day of is for unexpected guests only.

name: Fewest Moves Christmas 2018
information: Den eneste disciplin der vil blive afholdt til denne konkurrence er 3x3x3 i Færrest Træk! Der vil være pauser mellem de tre forsøg, hvor vi kan have noget julesjov. Vi vil lave pakkeleg, hvor det er muligt at deltage, hvis man medbringer en lille gave. Efter konkurrencen vil det være muligt at blive og hygge til klokken 20:00. Frokost og julesnacks vil blive serveret i løbet af dagen og er en del af detagergebyret. Det vil også være muligt at få aftensmad, men det vil koste ekstra :) ____ The only event which will be held at this competition is 3x3x3 Fewest Moves! There will be breaks between the attempts where we can have some Christmas fun. One of these activities will be "Pakkeleg" where you can bring a small gift if you wish to participate. After the competition it will be possible to stay for hygge until 20:00. Lunch and Christmas snacks will be provided in the registration fee. Dinner is optional and will cost extra :)

name: Fewest Moves LA 2019

If you need to stay, but are not competing, you will need to wait outside the venue.

name: First State 2018
information: The registration fee will be $25 per competitor and there is a competitor limit of 200. Registration will open on May 1st, 2018 at 8pm EST, and will close on July 4th, 2018 or when the competitor limit is reached. Competitors MUST register and pay online in order to compete. No at-the-door registrations or payments will be accepted. ALL SPECTATORS ARE WELCOME TO ATTEND FOR FREE.
venue: University of Delaware - Newark Campus - Clayton Conference Center

name: Flag City Fall 2018

name: Flag City Spring 2018
information: There is a registration fee of $15, more details can be seen below. There is a limit of 100 competitors who may register online. We will be allowing at the door registration, HOWEVER, you will only be permitted to compete in 3x3 only. You will still be expected to pay the $15 registration.
venueDetails: Follow signs to cafeteria and or classrooms

name: Flen Christmas Sleepover 2018
information: Varmt välkomna till den första upplagan av Flen Christmas Sleepover 2018! Det blir en tävling som sträcker sig från fredag kväll till och med söndag med många rundor av 14 grenar. De som önskar kan boka plats för att sova på golvet i en närliggande lokal. Läs igenom alla flikar på denna sida innan ni anmäler er, då dessa innehåller mycket nyttig information om tävlingen! Welcome to the first Flen Christmas Sleepover! This will be a competition ranging from Friday evening to Sunday with many rounds in 14 events. It is possible to book a spot for sleeping on the floor in a nearby venue. Please proceed to read all the tabs before registering as they contain a lot of usual information about the competition!
venueDetails: On the second floor, in the smaller conference hall called "Lilla Manschetten".

name: Flen New Year's Blind 2017
information: A competition focused on blindsolving. Participation fee: 100 SEK. Registration is not accepted until the registration fee is paid. See the "payment" tab for more information about how to pay the registration fee. Foreigners may pay the registration fee at the competition. There will be a limit of 40 competitors for 3x3. All other events will not have a competitor limit. Registration closes on the 8th of January. See the other tabs for more information.
venueDetails: Lilla Manschetten, on the second floor.

name: Fleur-de-lis Fall 2018
information: There will be a 60 person competitor limit for Fleur-de-lis Fall 2018. The registration fee for this competition is $20. The venue is located in the Meeting Room of the East Baton Rouge Independence Park Library.
venue: East Baton Rouge Independence Park Library
venueDetails: The competition will take place in the Meeting Room, which is just past the Courtyard Fountain.

name: FLIP Open 2013
information: Competition is held during the "28ème Festival Ludique International de Parthenay", famousrnbig games festival from 3 to 14 july 2013 . In the streets and venues, lots of vendors and games creators, animations, shows,rnvideos games, board games, card games, classics (chess, checkers, tarot, poker ...)...rnlink to the festival website : http://www.jeux-festival.com/ rnrnCompetition is open from 9am to 6 pm on saturday and sunday to all competitors.rnSchedule to be listed on AFS website page, see below.rnrnFree bedrooms are offered in a school 20' by foot far from the venue, registration for bedrooms to be requested asap to the Rubik competition organiser: [Jean-Louis MATHIEU](mailto:jlm@numericable.com) places are limited, do not be late to ask.

name: FLIP Open 2014
information: Competition is held during the "29ème Festival Ludique International de Parthenay", a famous big games festival from 9 to 20 july 2014. Free bedrooms are available in a school close to the venue, if you are interested please contact as soon as possible the organizer (there is a limited number of places).

name: FLIP Open 2015
information: The competition is held during the "30ème Festival Ludique International de Parthenay", a famous big games festival from 8 to 19 july 2014. Registration is free. 40 competitors max. Free bedrooms are also available in a school close to the venue, if you are interested please contact as soon as possible the organizer (everyone asking before march 25th will have a bed for sure).

name: FLIP Open 2017
information: This will be a small competition with only 8 events, in order to let the competitors enjoy the game festival where it takes place. A few spots will be available to sleep in a boarding school near the competition. If you're interested, please contact the organizers as soon as possible. Ce sera une petite compétition comprenant seulement 8 épreuves officielles, pour laisser le temps aux compétiteurs et compétitrices de profiter du festival dans lequel la compétition se déroule. Quelques places seront disponibles pour dormir dans un internat proche de la compétition. Si vous êtes intéressés

name: FLIP Rubik Open 2016
information: Competition is held during the "31ème Festival Ludique International de Parthenay", famous big games festival from 6 to 17 july 2016 . In the streets and venues, lots of vendors and games creators, animations, shows, video games, board games, card games, classics (chess, checkers, tarot, poker ...)... competition and festival websites : see below Competition is open from 10am to 12 pm on saturday and sunday from 1:30pm to 6pm. Limit of 35 competitors. Free bedrooms are offered in a school 20' by foot far from the venue, registration for bedrooms to be requested asap to the organiser: [Jean-Louis MATHIEU](mailto:rubikfr88@gmail.com) places are limited, do not be late to ask.

name: Fraser Valley Spring Open 2018
information: Speedcubing has at last come to the township of Langley! We look forward to a full house of 90 competitive cubers on Saturday April 7th, 2018! Canadian or USD cash is required at the competition for those wishing to eat on site at our handy concession. Calling for additional help: Those previously experienced as scramblers, judges and runners willing to gift some of their time on April 7th are asked to e-mail [Lindy](mailto:lindy@flefc.org) to commit to volunteering for a portion of the day! **A second registration period will open on Saturday, March 3rd, at 10 AM (Pacific Time).**
venueAddress: 8870 Glover Road, Fort Langley, BC, Canada V1M 2K1
venueDetails: The competition will be located in the gym.

name: Fraser Valley Spring Open 2019
information: You’ve asked. We’ve said yes! Speedcubing is AGAIN coming to the township of Langley! Similar to last year, we look forward to a full house of 90 competitive cubers, this time on SATURDAY MAY 4th, 2019. The lunch and snack concession is back and CAD or USD **CASH** is required at the competition for those wishing to eat on site here. **Calling for your volunteer help**. Those previously experienced as scramblers, judges and runners willing to gift some of their time are asked to e-mail [Lindy](mailto:lindy@flefc.org) to say that **of course** you're in! Volunteering is fun, engages you fully in the day and, with plenty of help, keeps the competition events moving along in a timely manner. A judging tutorial will be provided just prior to the start of the day. Anyone who volunteers- yes, parents, too- are eligible to put their name in our draw for little thank you prizes! See you all there and we appreciate you emailing in to volunteer a portion of your day.
venueAddress: 8870 Glover Road, Fort Langley, BC, Canada V1M 2R9
venueDetails: The competition will be located in the gym.

name: GLS Winter Camp 2019
information: Competition are dedicated for cubers who want to take a part in cubing training program. First part of each day will be focused on pro lessons with cubing teachers. After that we will have integration game and dinner. After dinner we planed 3 rounds of official event. One event / day (without cut-offs). Without rush and with attention for all cubers. We invite people who want to make progress with Fridrich Metod 3x3x3 and pro methods in 2x2, pyraminx, and skewb. This competition will be a training and integration camp before GLS League 2019.

name: Great Lakes Cubing Competition 2015
information: Cost is $15 per person ($5 Science Center members) and includes one Saturday event plus general admission to Great Lakes Science Center. 2-4 additional events can be added on Saturday for $5 each. Register for 5 or more events on Saturday for $30. A mosaic building competition will take place on Sunday, $30 per team of 2-3 competitors. Registration is available through the Science Center website or by calling the Science Center at 216-621-2400 (Monday - Friday, 9 am - 5:30 pm). All participants must register by end of day Wednesday, July 15. Family members of the partcipants will receive a $5 discount on admission to the Science Center the day of the competition.

name: Hamilton Spring 2017
information: Hamilton Spring 2017 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the Rubik's Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the day on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.
venueAddress: The Atrium Wintec City Campus Nisbet Street (off Ward Street) Hamilton

name: Hamilton Winter 2016
information: Hamilton Winter 2016 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the Rubik's Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. There are a variety of events from the regular 3x3 Rubik's Cube, to big 7x7 cubes, one-handed solving, and even blindfolded solving! The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the day on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations. If you are new to competing, you may want to look at CubingUSA's Competitor Tutorial.

name: Hayward Rubik's Rumble 2016
information: Like last year's Rubik's Rumble, registration can be paid online via PayPal prior to the competition, or on-site in cash on the day of the competition. name: Heimaey Open 2018
information: This competition will take place on the 6th of June and it is the first competition ever in Heimaey! To get to the island you need to go with a ferry called Herjólfur. The harbor is called Landeyjahöfn and is ~2 hours away from Reykjavík. It is possible to take a bus from there. You can order tickets to the ferry here - https://www.seatours.is/ . You can check out booking.com or airbnb.com for information about hotels and other places to stay in over night. Our goal with the schedule is to have events that were not held at Icelandic nationals. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Þetta mót verður haldið 6. júni og er það fyrsta mótið á Heimaey frá upphafi! Til þess að komast á eyjuna þarft þú að fara með ferjunni Herjólfi. Hann er staðsettur í Landeyjahöfn og er u.þ.b. tveggja klukkustunda keyrsla frá Reykjavík til Landeyjahafnar. Hægt er að taka strætó á milli staða. Hér getur þú pantað miða í Herjólf - https://www.saeferdir.is/ferdir-i-bodi/vestmannaeyjar/ Þú getur kíkt á booking.com / airbnb.com fyrir upplýsingar um hótel eða aðra gistingu í Vestmannaeyjum.

name: Happy New Year Cubing Dordrecht 2018
information: Welkom bij [Happy New Year Cubing Dordrecht](http://www.kubuswedstrijden.nl/happy-new-year-cubing-dordrecht-2018/), een 2-daagse wedstrijd op de laatste vrijdag en zaterdag van de kerstvakantie. Voor de vrijdagavond kun je je inschrijven voor een gezamenlijke maaltijd. LET OP: je inschrijving is pas definitief nadat je hebt betaald via [het betaalformulier op kubuswedstrijden.nl](http://www.kubuswedstrijden.nl/betaalformulier-dordrecht2018/) (met iDeal, PayPal, creditcard, Sofort of Bancontact).

name: Ho Chi Minh Open 2018
information: Welcome to the Ho Chi Minh Champion 2018! The competition will have many events and rounds, along with side-events! Be sure to check the Schedule Tab and information to know more about this competition! We welcome all speedcubers to join the event, to have fun and make friend while breaking your new records! ----- Chào mừng các bạn đến với giải thi đấu Ho Chi Minh Championship 2018! Giải đấu lần này sẽ có nhiều bộ môn và nhiều vòng thi đấu, song song với các bộ môn phụ! Các bạn hãy xem tab "Lịch thi đấu" để tìm hiểu thêm về cuộc thi này! Cuộc thi này chào mừng tất cả các bạn thí sinh đam mê bộ môn speedcubing, giao lưu học hỏi và tạo ra nhiều kỷ lục mới!

name: Ho Chi Minh Spring Open 2018
information: The first competition for Ho Chi Minh City. This competition will cover 2x2,3x3,4x4,5x5, Skewb and OH Open to all competitors, this will be a good chance to meet up and compete with others who share the same hobby. For the best practice, **please only register if you can join the competition**. Thank you. --- Đây là giải đấu đầu tiên của Tp.Hồ Chí Minh. Giải đấu sẽ bao gồm 2x2 -> 5x5, Skewb và OH. Giải đấu dành cho tất cả các bạn có niềm đam mê Rubik và các loại puzzle khác, là nơi giao lưu, học hỏi và tranh tài. Chú ý: Nhằm hỗ trợ cho BTC trong việc cân đối và sắp xếp cuộc thi, các bạn **hãy đăng ký thi thật sự có thể tham gia**. BTC xin cám ơn. Ngoài ra, có một số lưu ý cho các bạn: - BTC không chấp nhận đăng ký vào ngày thi đấu - Link đăng ký sẽ mở từ 17/3 cho tới ngày 10/4 - Lệ phí thi đấu sẽ được đóng tại địa điểm thi đấu

name: HSE Open 2018
information: Registration will be closed on February 2nd. When we reach 200 competitors all remaining registrations will be kept in waiting list. If a vacant place appears the next registration in waiting list will be accepted. Please be warned that all competitors that are in waiting list are **not** considered spectators. If you want to come to spectate you can register separately. More information in our [VK group](https://vk.com/hseopen20xx) Registration fee is **300 RUB** (~5 USD) and **FREE** for Higher School of Economics students and students of schools associated with HSE. The fees are accepted during the competition days at the venue. **There will not be pre-payment**. All spectators and guests are free to visit but they will need to register separately. More information in our [VK group](https://vk.com/hseopen20xx) Please check your e-mail regularly so you don't miss any important message from the organization team. Also, there will be a lot of useful information in [VK group](https://vk.com/hseopen20xx) so be sure to check it out. **If your registration isn't accepted within 48 hours please contact us so we can resolve the situation**

name: Hudson Valley Open 2018
information: **Payment - Mandatory** After registering please visit the payment tab and send $22 to the PayPal account listed. If you do not do this then you will NOT be able to compete. Thank you. **Lunch Options:** Pizza slices will be available at the competition, $2 per slice. If you want pizza please comment how many slices you when you are registering. **If you do not preorder the pizza there is no guarantee you will get any!** Water bottles will also be available for purchase, but you don't have to preorder for water. Also snacks will be sold at the competition by our food and snacks supervisor, Evan Rich. **Raffle:** There will be a raffle with various signed cubes. The raffle tickets will be sold for $1 each. **Registration Fee:** There is an 80 competitor limit. Registration is online only, and is $22 per competitor. Spectators may enter for free.

Please note once you register in WCA site for the Hyderabad Cube Open 2018, your name will be in waiting list and once your payment is done then your name will appear in competitors list in 1-2 days. All the participants are requested to volunteer in the competition and every participant (except New comers) will be assigned to a particular event they have to Judge (or) Scramble for the entire event, all this will be decided by the organising team and will be informed 2days before the event, we will make sure that your volunteering will not affect your main events and participation. You will have to pay the registration fees at the venue the day of the competition to participate: kr500 (~4€~4.5USD) ________ Þetta mót er einnig skráð sem "Íslandsmót" þar sem fljótustu Íslendingarnir munu fá verðlaun og verða þeir krýndir Íslandsmeistarar. Pláss á staðnum er takmarkað svo endilega látið okkur vita hversu marga gesti þið munuð hafa með ykkur. Mögulegt verður að panta stuttermaboli. Sendið spurningar á okkur ef eitthvað er óljóst! Mótsgjald er 500 krónur fyrir keppendur og verður það greitt á mótsdag. ________ .

name: Incredible Pencil Mania 2018
information: Registration Fee: Any requested changes to registration before the deadline will be honored. Your registration is not complete until your name shows up on the list. If you believe you paid and your name isn't showing up, please contact us and we will work it out. If you have registered and are no longer able to attend, please contact us. If it is before February 3rd, you are eligible for a refund for half of your fee on the condition that there is someone on the waitlist willing to take your spot. Attempting to file a chargeback for the registration fee will lead to being blacklisted from future WCA events. The registration fee will be $40 per competitor and there is a competitor limit of 350. Registration will open on Thursday September 7th at 8pm EST and will close on February 3rd, 2017 or when the competitor limit is reached. Competitors MUST register and pay online in order to compete. No at-the-door registrations or payments will be accepted. ALL SPECTATORS ARE WELCOME TO ATTEND FOR FREE. Please read the "Competitor Information" tab before registering.

Kami menerapkan sistem siapa cepat, dia dapat (siapa yang membayar terlebih dahulu). Setiap peserta akan mendapatkan takjil (snack) dan air putih untuk berbuka puasa. _____________________ This is the first official competition that held by the Jakarta Timur Rubik Community. The maximum competitors for this competition are 100 people. We will use the first 'come', first serve basis (who pays first). Every participants will get a free snack & water for breaking the fast.
venueAddress: Jl. Mayjen Sutoyo No. 76 Cililitan Jakarta Timur

name: Jambi Cube Competition 2017

venueAddress: Mendalo Darat, Jambi Luar Kota, Kota Jambi, Jambi 36122, Indonesia
venueDetails: Lobi Fakultas Sains & Teknologi Universitas Jambi

name: Japan Open 2017
information: 1競技につき500円の参加料となります。 参加費は当日入場時にお支払いください。 参加者が申込数が定員の200名に達した場合、すでに申し込みをしているのに競技者一覧に表示されていない方はキャンセル待ちとなります。キャンセル待ちの繰上げは11月20日（月）まで行いますので、もし都合がつかずキャンセルされる場合は、なるべくお早めにご連絡いただけますようお願いいたします。 500 Yen for each additional event. We accept payment only with cash at the entrance. In case competitors are over 200, you will be placed on waiting list. If a competitor cancels until 20 Nov, we will register the person who is on the top of the waiting list. If you will not participate this competition, please tell us.

name: Kazakhstan Open 2017
information: Максимум один гость на одного участника. Мы сократили количество дисциплин, чтобы мы могли принять больше участников ======= Пожалуйста, напишите свое имя и фамилию на кириллице. Вы можете внести регистрационный взнос в день проведения конкурса. ======= Бұл Қазақстандағы алғашқы WCA байқауы. Біз осы жарыстың артынан көп болады деген үміттеміз. Конкурстың басталуына дейін 1-2 апта бұрын сіздің қатысуыңызды растау үшін электронды хат аласыз. Пошта жәшігіңізді және спамды жіберетін уақытты тексеріңіз. Егер сіз растамасаңыз, онда сіз бәсекелестердің тізімінен аластатыласыз. ====== Это первый конкурс WCA в Казахстане. Мы надеемся, что после этого конкурса последует еще много. Примерно за 1-2 недели до конкурса вы получите электронное письмо, чтобы подтвердить свое участие. Обязательно проверяйте свой почтовый ящик и спам. Если вы не подтвердите, то вы удалитесь из списка конкурсантов. ====== This is the first WCA competition in Kazakhstan. We hope after this competition many more will follow. Around 1-2 weeks before the competition you will receive an email to confirm your participation. Please make sure to check your mailbox and spam box around that time. If you do not confirm, then you will removed from the list of competitors.

name: Koalafication Brisbane 2019
information: This competition is part of a series of events around Australia to enable competitors to obtain qualifying results for the upcoming WCA World Championship 2019 in Melbourne. For more information, visit the [WCA World Championship 2019 website](https://wc2019.speedcubing.org.au/en/). Please note that you only have to attend the day(s) with the events you are competing in, so please check the schedule. Due to parking restrictions we suggest you only attend on Sunday morning if you are competing in 3x3x3 Fewest Moves. **Contact Us** We are on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/SpeedcubingAustralia/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/speedcubingau) and [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/speedcubingau/)! information: 이 대회는 제 21회 서울국제만화애니메이션 페스티벌 "[SICAF 2017](http://sicaf.org/)" 의 일부분 입니다. This competition is part of Seoul International Cartoon Animation Festival "[SICAF 2017](http://sicaf.org/)". 참가 정원: 200명 참가 접수 마감: 7월 10일 오후 7시 까지 참가비: 첫 종목 만원, 추가 종목당 3천원. * 대회 참가자 및 보호자 1인 까지는 페스티벌 참가비가 무료입니다. **모든 참가자에게는 기념품이 주어집니다!** **참가신청 하실 때, comment란에 티셔츠 사이즈를 알려주세요. 알려주시지 않으면 임의로 배정됩니다.** 입금 계좌: IBK 은행 299-079830-02-011 (유병선) * 현장 접수는 받지 않습니다. * ***입금 이후 환불은 가능하지 않습니다.*** 단, 참가자 명단에 들지 못한 경우에는 전액 환불해 드립니다. * 참가 신청 + 참가비 입금 = 참가 접수 완료 -------- Competitor limit: 200 people Registration period ends on July. 10. 7PM Registration fee: 10000 WON for first event, 3000 WON for each additional event. * The fee for the festival is free for competitors and up to one person per competitor. * For foreign competitors please pay at the competition; no bank transfer is necessary **Each participant will receive goodies!** **Please indicate your t-shirt size in the comment field when registering. If no size is indicated, then a random shirt will be provided.** * Please transfer money to this account: IBK Bank 299-079830-02-011 (유병선) * No registration will be allowed at the venue. * ***No refunds***, except if you transferred money and did not make the competitor list. * Registration on this website + money transfer = completion of registration

name: KSF Ust-Kamenogorsk City 2019
information: Дополнительная информация будет публиковаться в нашей [группе Вконтакте](https://vk.com/ksfustkamenogorskcity2019). Перед подачей заявки ознакомьтесь с информацией о регистрации. Регистрация с неправильно введенным именем и фамилией не будут приняты, пожалуйста внимательно проверьте внесенные данные. Подача заявки и оплата взноса за участие или входного билета гостя/зрителя означает, что Вы ознакомлены и согласны с правилами проведения чемпионата Если вы ознакомились с условиями регистрации и условиями оплаты взноса на вкладке "Как оплатить участие (Payment information)", то вы можете перейти к регистрации. ВНИМАНИЕ!!! 1. Если участник приходит без совершеннолетнего сопровождающего, то он обязан при себе иметь письменное заявление-согласие от родителей либо опекунов, о том, что они самостоятельно несут ответственность за несовершеннолетнего ребенка. 2. Головоломки используемые в соревнованиях должны иметь отличительные отметки, по которым их легко может идентифицировать владелец (например: нацарапанные инициалы или имя с внутренней стороны съемной крышки) ====================================================== После оплаты взноса ваша фамилия появится на сайте. Это означает что ваша заявка принята. Если вы не оплатили взнос, то примерно за 1-2 недели до соревнований вы получите письмо с напоминанием о необходимости оплатить взнос для подтверждения своего участия. Обязательно проверяйте свой ящик и спам. Если вы не оплатите взнос, то Ваша заявка не будет принята. Если Вы подали заявку и оплатили взнос, но в течении 2-х рабочих дней ее не подтвердили, сразу обратитесь к организаторам (не считая выходные дни). В день соревнований участнику и гостю при себе нужно иметь документ удостоверяющий личность. For more info please visit our [VK Group](https://vk.com/ksfustkamenogorskcity2019). Before submitting the application, read the registration information. Registration with incorrect first and last name will not be accepted, please carefully check the entered data. Submitting an application and paying a participation fee or a guest / viewer entrance ticket means that you acquainted and agree with the rules of the championship If you have read the terms of registration and the terms of payment of the fee in the tab "How to pay / How to pay for participation", then you can proceed to registration. **ATTENTION!!! 1. If a participant under 18 years old attends the competition without adult, he must have written application from parents or legal guardians that they are responsible for their child. 2. Puzzles used in competitions must have distinctive marks by which the owner can easily identify them (for example, scratched initials or the name on the inside of the removable cover) ** After paying the fee, your name will appear on the site. This means that your application has been accepted. If you did not pay the fee, then approximately 1-2 weeks before the competition you will receive an email with a reminder to pay a fee to confirm your participation. Be sure to check your box and spam. If you do not pay the fee, your application will not be accepted. If you submitted an application and paid the fee, but it was not confirmed within 2 business days, contact the organizers immediately (not counting the weekend). On the day of the competition, the participant and the guest need to have an identity document.

name: Londrina Open 2017
information: As inscrições encerrarão dia 20/03/2017 e custam R$15,00 para os cubos 3x3 e 2x2 e mais R$1,00 por modalidade adicional. Após esse período, só será possível a inscrição na modalidade Rubik's Cube (3x3x3) no dia do campeonato. A taxa de inscrição deve ser paga até o dia 21/03/2017, ela demonstra o compromisso de participação do competidor e essas informações são usadas para planejamento e organização do campeonato, por esse motivo não é reembolsável. Sua inscrição não estará completa até a confirmação do pagamento! É imprescindível ter lido as regras da WCA. O competidor poderá se inscrever em quantas modalidades desejar. Pedimos que não se inscreva nas modalidades que não possui intenção de participar. A entrada do público para assistir ao campeonato será gratuita.
venueAddress: R. Goiás, 1774 - Centro, Londrina - PR, 86010-465, Brasil

name: Manaus Cubo Plaza Open 2018
information: As inscrições no site poderão ser realizadas até o dia 12/09, o valor de inscrição será de R$15,00 a ser pago no dia da competição, na hora do Check-in. Por favor, caso você se inscreva mas decida não ir ao campeonato, por favor nos informe para que possamos programar corretamente a quantidade de competidores. Quem for participar apenas do 3x3, pode ir só no domingo, mas sugerimos ir no sábado para ver como funciona e conhecer o pessoal. É imprescindível ter lido as regras da WCA (https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/). O competidor poderá se inscrever em quantas modalidades desejar. Pedimos que não se inscreva nas modalidades que não possui intenção de participar. A entrada do público para assistir ao campeonato será gratuita. Os 3 melhores competidores estreantes serão premiados; As 3 mulheres mais rápidas também serão premiadas; Os 3 mais novos (idade) também serão premiados. Premiação em medalhas e certificados de partipação.
venueAddress: Av. Djalma Batista, 2100 - Parque Dez de Novembro, 69050-010
venueDetails: Palco da praça de alimentação (3º andar)

name: Manaus Cubo Plaza Open 2019
information: **PORTUGUESE** A competição é reconhecida pela Associação Mundial de Cubo Mágico (WCA) e os resultados farão parte dos rankings oficiais. Teremos premiações (medalhas) para os três primeiros colocados de cada modalidade. Contamos com a colaboração de TODOS para tornar a competição mais fluida. Portanto, quando solicitado, prontifique-se para ser juiz, embaralhador ou runner. **ENGLISH** The competitions is aknowledged by the World Cube Association (WCA) and the results will be ranked officially. There will be prizes (medals) for the first three best results in each event. We count on EVERYBODY's collaboration to make this competition more fluid. Therefore, when asked, please be ready to be a judge, scrambler or runner.

information: There will be 3 registration systems: **Early Bird**, **Regular**, and **Walk-On**. 1. **Early Bird**: Payments completed before January 20, 2018 are considered **Early Bird**, and are entitled to TWO(2) Raffle Tickets. Registration fee: 90,000 IDR for 3x3x3 and 10,000 IDR for each additional event, with a maximum fee of 200,000 IDR. 2. **Regular**: Payments completed within January 20-26, 2018 are considered **Regular**, and are entitled to ONE(1) Raffle Ticket. Registration fee: 100,000 IDR for 3x3x3 and 10,000 IDR for each additional event, with a maximum fee of 210,000 IDR. 3. **Walk-On**: Walk-on competitors are accepted. Registration fee: 110,000 IDR for 3x3x3 and 10,000 IDR for each additional event, with a maximum fee of 220,000 IDR. **Payment Methods**: 1. Bank Transfer(For Indonesians and Expats) 2. name: Mental Breakdown Norway 2019
information: **English:** Welcome to Mental Breakdown Norway 2019 This competition focuses on the five most advanced events we have: FM, 3 blind, 4 blind, 5 blind and multi blind. This is the first time such a competition is held in Norway. It is open to anyone who wants to attend, but since the events are quite demanding, we do not expect many first timers. Note that we do not compete in normal 3x3 at this competition! Also note that we only allow 30 competitors. **Norwegian:** Velkommen til Mental Breakdown Norge 2019! Dette er en WCA-konkurranse som fokuserer på de fem mest krevende eventene vi har: FM, 3-blind,4-blind, 5-blind og multiblind. Dette er den første av sitt slag i Norge. Alle som ønsker å delta er velkommen, men siden eventene er ganske krevende, så vi regner med at de fleste som kommer har deltatt på konkurranse før. Legg merke til at vi ikke konkurrerer i vanlig 3x3 i denne konkurransen! Legg også merke til at vi kun godtar opp til 30 deltakere.
venueDetails: Enter the main entrance, then go right after the stairs to Samlingssalen.

name: Mental Breakdown Summer 2018
information: Registration Fee: There is a **$20** registration fee for the event, payable through the WCA Stripe payment system. Please note that even after payment, registrations need to be manually approved before appearing on the registration list, so you may still not be fully confirmed immediately after payment. Please keep an eye out for the e-mail saying you have been approved. Registration is on a first-come first-serve and the same will go for the waitlist once registration fills up. Please do not register unless you intend on competing as it will open up a spot for another competitor who does intend on competing. **We will only be accepting online payment at this competition. If you have any issues with this, please contact us!** There is a **25 competitor limit** to the competition. Please register as soon as possible if you plan on coming! Registration closes at the end of the day on July 7th. We will grant refunds to those who let us know by July 7th, but no refunds are granted after that date. This competition is recognized as an official World Cube Association competition. Therefore, all competitors should be familiar with the [WCA regulations](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/). If you are new to competing, you may want to look at [CubingUSA's Competitor Tutorial](https://www.cubingusa.com/ctutorial.php). Join the PNW Facebook group to hear about competitions in the Pacific Northwest before they are announced and keep in touch with cubers in the area! [![Image description](http://i.imgur.com/8uf2SCt.png)](https://www.facebook.com/groups/159856602085/)

information: Mindanao Championship 2017 Sponsored by Qiyi Mofangge Cube Registration Fee: P150.00 Free ID Lace August 19-20, 2017 NCCC Mall Davao Kadayawan Hall Waiting for WCA Link Registration: P150 - (1-4 Categories) P250 - (5-8 Categories) P350 - (9-12 Categories) P450 - (13-16 Categories) Participant Limit: 500 Only Shirt design, logo etc are already in progress. Courtesy: Zianyanyan Kiero Callao... Official Photographer: Klea Mendones Official Judges: SevenTeens For this year all proceeds for the event will be donated to the Children of Marawi for our "Cubing for a Cause Program". There is an ongoing war with ISIS in Marawi one of the towns here in Mindanao and I hope that we could give these Children smiles. Any toy could definitely do it. My girlfriend and I will head on the refugee area during the donation drive. We will have: 1. Feeding program, and 2. A mini- game with the kids. 3. Donation Drive Thank you all for Joining

name: Mind Games 2017
information: Mind Games 2017 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. It is focused on some of the more mentally demanding events, that are given less of a focus in normal competitions - blindfolded and fewest moves solving, specifically. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience or skill, but there is a competitor limit of 60 people (FMC will have a limit of 25 competitors), due to venue constraints. There will also be event-based time limits in place, to ensure we stay on schedule, especially given the time taken by fewest moves solving. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.
venueAddress: 72 Kemp St, Kilbirnie, Wellington 6022, New Zealand

name: Nacionales El Salvador 2018
information: Primera competencia Nacional de El Salvador. Los ganadores salvadoreños seran reconocidos como Campeones Nacionales Salvadoreños del año 2018. Podran realizar el pago de $5.00 de forma adelantada en la cuenta de banco antes de la fecha limite, lo cual incluye todas las categorias disponibles, o el dia del evento dando como pago base $5.00 que incluye 2 categorias a su eleccion y $1.00 por categoria extra. **Costo de inscripcion no es reenbolsable.** -Registro el dia del evento estara sujeto a disponibilidad de limite de participantes. First Salvadoran National Competition. The salvadoran winners will be recognized as 2018's Salvadoran National Champions. You can make the $5 payment on the bank account before the deadline, this will include all the available categories, or you can make an-on site payment on the competition day with a base fee of $5.00 which includes 2 categories of youre choise and $1.00 for each extra category. **Registration fee is not refundable.** On-site Registration is subject to the limit availability

name: Newark Head to Head 2013
information: The second round of 3x3x3 will be held as a head to head battle. The competitors with the top 32 averages from round 1 will move on, and will continue to round two where they will compete one on one until a winner is found. The top 8 single times from the first solve of the head-to-head will determine who moves onto the final round of the official 3x3x3 competition. Only the first solve of the head-to-head will be official. The remainder of the head-to-head competition will be unofficial and for entertainment purposes.
venueDetails: Centennial Hall, on the second floor

name: New Zamora 2019
information: ![Image description](https://scontent.fzmm1-1.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.15752-9/51330694_391419704978720_3631667970033319936_n.png?_nc_cat=101&_nc_ht=scontent.fzmm1-1.fna&oh=d6b37eeab3c70b1bea4e24453fdccc83&oe=5CEDB12B) Todos los competidores deben estar familiarizados y entender el reglamento de la WCA antes de la competencia. Regla [2t](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/translations/spanish-american/#2t) Todos los competidores deben estar disponibles para scramblear, juecear, runnear o capturar tiempos de lo contrario, serán descalificados de la competencia. Regla [1e2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/translations/spanish-american/#1e2) Regla [1f2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/translations/spanish-american/#1f2) Each competitor must be familiar with and understand the WCA Regulations before the competition. Rule [2t](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#2t) Every competitor must be available for judging, scrambling, running or score taking. Penalty: disqualification from the competition. Rule [1e2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#1e2) Rule [1f2 ](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#1f2)

name: New Zealand Nationals 2016
information: New Zealand Nationals 2016 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the days on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.
venueAddress: North Harbour Stadium, Albany, Auckland 0632, New Zealand

name: New Zealand Nationals 2017
information: New Zealand Nationals 2017 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the Rubik's Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the day on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.
venueAddress: Wellington Girls' College, Pipitea St, Thorndon, Wellington
venueDetails: School Hall, adjacent to the main entrance

name: New Zealand Nationals 2018
information: New Zealand Nationals 2018 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the 3x3x3 Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the days on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations. In Addition New Zealand Nationals 2018 will crown the National Champions in 17 events of the World Cube Associations 18 over the course of 3 days.

name: No Place For DNF Spring 2018
information: **Competitor Limit: 100 Registration Fee: $25.00** **-All proceeds from the competition will be donated to the No Place for Hate charity. -Cube Depot will sponsor the competition and will be a vendor. -We will be holding a raffle. Bring one working cube per contestant in exchange for a raffle ticket. Cubes collected will be donated to spread cubing awareness. Additional raffle tickets may be purchased for $1 each. -FMC will begin promptly at 8:45. If you arrive after 8:45 and want to participate, you are welcome to compete, but will have to finish at 9:45. -Please observe silence during FMC.**

name: No Place For DNF Spring 2019
information: The main event of this competition is 3x3 Fewest Moves. -We recommend that you arrive at least 15 minutes before your first event because there are no set times for each group. If your first event is later in the day, you do not have to arrive until then. If you miss your group, you will be disqualified from that event. -Groups will be posted and sent in an email a few days before the competition. When it is time to compete, groups will be called instead of individual participants. -Food and drinks are **NOT** permitted inside the main room. You may eat in the cafeteria next door.There are a few restaurants within a ten minute drive. -Live results will be posted on cubecomps.com. -All proceeds from the competition will be donated to the No Place for Hate charity. -CubeDepot will sponsor the competition and will be a vendor! **A local newspaper photographer will be taking pictures of the competition. If you would not like to have your picture taken, please let us know.** **Please observe silence during FMC and blindfold events.** **This competition will not be holding the famous 3x3 speedsolve event. We still encourage newer competitors to try out other events!**

name: Nordic Championship 2018
information: This competition will be the first edition of a Nordic Championship! **Citizens of Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Iceland, Latvia, Lithuania, Norway, and Sweden are eligible for prizes and the (unofficial) titles for this championship.** The competition is still open to citizens of every country. Please be sure to read all the tabs and regularly check your email leading up to this competition! Remember to check your email, there will be an email sent out a few days before the competition will take place. It will contain some more detailed information about the competition.

name: North Plainfield Open 2018
information: This is a one-day competition with an 80 competitor limit. Please enter the venue through the red double doors. We recommend that you arrive to the competition at least 10 minutes before your first event because here are no set times for each group. If your first event is later in the day, you do not have to arrive until then. Note that if you miss your group you will disqualified from the event. Groups will be posted a few days leading up to the competition. Please familiarize yourselves with your groups. When it's time to compete, groups will be called instead of individual participants. Food and drinks are permitted inside the main room, but lunch will not be provided for competitiors or guests. There are also a few restaurants within a ten-minute drive. Results will be posted live on cubecomps.com and finalized on this website after the competition. **Please observe silence during all Blindfolded events.**

name: NxNZ Open 2018
information: NxNZ Open 2018 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the Rubik's Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but there is a competitor limit of 60 people, due to venue constraints. There will also be event-based time limits in place, to ensure we stay on schedule. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.

information: **As inscrições encerrarão dia 12/03/2017 e custam R$10,00 + 1Kg de alimento não perecível (devendo ser levado no dia do campeonato)**. Após esse período, só será possível a inscrição na modalidade Rubik's Cube (3x3x3) no dia do campeonato. **A taxa de inscrição deve ser paga até o dia 14/03/2017**, ela demonstra o compromisso de participação do competidor e essas informações são usadas para planejamento e organização do campeonato, por esse motivo não é reembolsável. Sua inscrição não estará completa até a confirmação do pagamento! É imprescindível ter lido as regras da WCA. **O competidor poderá se inscrever em quantas modalidades desejar. Pedimos que não se inscreva nas modalidades que não possui intenção de participar.** **A entrada do público para assistir ao campeonato será mediante a entrega de 1kg de alimento não perecível.**

name: P3 Grand Open 2016
information: If the number of participants are more than 150 in any event, we may restrict the further participants. Partipants needs to pre-register in WCA and they will not be allowed to do any spot registrations on 3rd or 4th December 2016 to participate. Participation registration closes on 1st December 2016 at 9:00pm IST. Payment should be made before 1st December 2016 at 9:00pm IST to get the registration confirmation. Participation will be cancelled if there is a failure of registration and payment before the given cut off time. All the participants are recommended to be available 30 minutes before the event of participation in the venue. Non-Indian nationality participants are requested to bring their passport.

name: P3 Grand Open - Feb 2017
information: If the number of participants are more than 100 in any event, we may restrict the further participation. Partipants needs to pre-register for the event in WCA as they will not be allowed to do any spot registrations on 26th February 2017 to participate. Participation registration for the event closes on 24th February 2017 at 9:00pm IST. Payment also should be made before 24th February 2017 9:00pm IST. Please note once you register in WCA site for the event P3 GRAND OPEN - Feb 2017, your name will be in waiting list and once your payment is done then your name will appear in competitors list in 1-2 days. Your name will be rejected if there is a failure in payment within 2 days of your event registration in WCA site. If your name is not showing in competitors list in WCA site under the P3 Grand Open - Feb 2017 event, you will not be allowed to participate.

name: Please Be Quiet LA 2018
information: This competition is being organized by Cubing Club at UCLA. All UCLA students may register free of charge; the fee is $14 for everyone else. There will be a competitor limit of 25, and no walk-in registrations. Spectators may attend for free, but must be quiet as the events being held require a lot of concentration on the part of the competitors. If you are a UCLA student looking to attend a local competition but can't do the blindfolded events, note that we are planning another competition in the spring with more standard events such as 3x3x3 and pyraminx. Don't be afraid to show up to this one for a bit to spectate and/or help us out! **Please note that no food is allowed in the classroom.**
venueAddress: 345 Portola Plaza, Los Angeles, CA 90095, USA

Prospective competitors who have trouble with the payment system **must** contact Reno Rubik's Cube Club to troubleshoot or arrange an alternative method of payment. * University of Nevada, Reno students, staff, and faculty are permitted to compete at a discounted rate of $12.50, paid via Stripe. * **Contrary to regular Reno competitions, this competition will accept no walk-on registrants.**

name: Princeton Fall 2017
information: The Princeton Fall Open 2017 is open to all competitors. Competitors must familiarize themselves with the WCA Regulations found on this site. Their is a flat fee of $25 to register for this competition via Stripe. **Registration fees must be paid in advance in order for your registration to be considered final.** There will be no refunds. Registration fees cover the cost of the venue and a special Princeton Fall 2017 poster. Princeton students are free and should comment with a note about that when they register. There will be a competitor limit of 100 competitors. Registration will open on 8/4/17. When our limit is reached, you may be added to the waiting list in case some people choose to drop out later. There will be no at the door registrations. No exceptions whatsoever. If you would like to pre-order a Princeton Fall 2017 t-shirt, as we have done for each competition in the past, we will send out an email to all competitors shortly after registration closes to set that up.

name: Puebla Be Quiet 2018
information: Primera competencia en México con todas las categorias "silenciosas" Todas las categorías *BLINDFOLD* y 3 intentos de *FMC*. *Fase 1: $150.00 (15 de Mayo último día) Fase 2: $200.00 (30 de Mayo, último día)* **IMPORTANTE** Lleva una identificación con fotografía el día de la competencia (de lo contrario no podrás acceder a la sede) También tus acompañantes deberán llevar una identificación para su acceso. Bajo ninguna circunstancia habrá inscripciones una vez que el límite sea haya cubierto. Si hiciste el depósito y no alcanzaste lugar, favor de mandar correo electrónico después del día del evento para poder regresar tu cooperación (Fecha Límite, 30 de Junio) al correo: KeepYourCalmMexico@gmail.com **Límite de competidores : 80 ** Costo de recuperación: $150

name: Quinnipiac 2018
information: Quinnipiac University will host its first official WCA competition this September! We are planning a competition with a relaxed but engaging and social atmosphere, that will hopefully give the Connecticut cubing community a chance to connect. The theme of this competition is breadth rather than depth. Our events will sample a variety of puzzle categories, from larger cubes (4x4) and different solving approaches (One-Handed, Blindfolded, Fewest Moves), to puzzles of different shapes (Pyraminx, Skewb, Square-1). All events except the traditional 3x3 speedsolve will be single rounds; Fewest Moves in particular will consist of **one** hour-long attempt. Family, friends, and guests are welcome, but we ask competitors to let us know the number of people attending on their registration forms. The parking lot in front of the venue should be free of charge, but there are no guarantees if that particular lot reaches capacity. We look forward to seeing you in September!
venue: Quinnipiac University Athletic and Recreation Center

name: Rockville Winter 2017
information: For the first two weeks, registration will only be approved for students. The registration fee is $15, and the competitor limit is 125. Until you pay the registration fee, you will be placed on a waiting list. With the WCA system, registration must be manually checked before approval, so please allow up to 24 hours to be moved from the waiting list.

name: Rocky Mountain Spring 2019
information: Please note that in the morning (between 8:00-9:30am), 3x3 BLD and 4x4 BLD will be going on and the doors will to the main room will be closed until these events have been completed. This competition is open to any and all competitors that would like to compete. There will be a 90-competitor limit so please be sure to register early, as spots are likely to fill quickly. **There will be NO walk-in registrations accepted.** Should registration fill up, you can be placed on a waiting list, in case someone else is unable to attend the competition. Please let us know at least two weeks before the competition if you are not able to attend the competition, so we can fill your slot with someone from the waiting list. This competition is recognized as an official World Cube Association competition. Therefore, all competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations. If you are new to competing, you may want to look at CubingUSA's Competitor Tutorial.
venueAddress: 6 W, S 33rd St, Colorado Springs, CO 80904

name: SacCubing VI 2019
information: ![Image description](https://b2b989d215c701ad63d7-288404e13f895703cf2798bf6ae95228.ssl.cf1.rackcdn.com/734655566969-350.png) It's finally here! Sacramento's big annual winter competition is coming! Be sure to reserve your registration now! The event will be in Bonner Gym at Del Oro High School. **This venue is different from past venues that have held SacCubing in the past.** All competitors must be available to judge/run/scramble for the competition as per Regulation [1e2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#1e2) and [1f2](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#1f2). All competitors will be expected to help by judging or running for any event they are doing. Nametags will be handed out with all the information regarding what groups you will be competing in and what groups you will be helping in. If you are not competing in an event, you will not be assigned to help during that event.

name: Saitama 2018
information: さいたま2018は，3x3x3キューブのほか，普段頻繁にはない種目を複数ラウンド開催することをテーマとした大会です。開催種目は，3x3x3，7x7x7，3x3x3目隠し，メガミンクスが2ラウンド，スキューブ，スクエア1が3ラウンドです。 本大会では多くのラウンドを開催するため，席を移動することなく5試技連続で行うなど競技進行において新たな試みを予定しています。 Saitama 2018 is characterized by multiple rounds of events less frequently held. It includes two rounds for 3x3x3, 7x7x7, 3x3x3 blindfolded, Megaminx and three rounds for Skewb and Square-1. For smoothness of the competition, we introduce some experimental round procedure (announced later.)

information: Decidimos hacer una competencia con un poco mas de descanso y diversion. Qui (https://swisscubing.ch/it/swisscubing-cup-2018/) trovi le informazioni relative alle altre edizioni.
