name: Selandia Open 2016
information: Information DK Der vil være skilte på hoveddøren, og dørene åbner kl. 9:30. Transport: Der er parkeringspladser ved venuen. Det er nemt at komme til venuen ved offentlig transport da der er mange togforbindelser til Slagelse St. Nærmere informationer kan findes på rejseplanen.dk, hvor destinationen kan sættes til stoppestedet 'Selandia'. Der er ca. 20 minutters gang fra Slagelse St. Mad: Der ligger en McDonald's og Burger King 2 km fra gymnasiet, og en Lidl 600 m fra gymnasiet. Overnatning: Det er ikke muligt at overnatte på venue. Information EN Follow the signs at the main entrance. The venue will open at 9 AM. Transport: There are parking spots at the venue. It is easy to commute to the venue by public transport, as many trains stop in Slagelse. You can take a train directly from the train station at Copenhagen Airport to Slagelse St., or a train from Copenhagen Airport to Copenhagen Central Station, and then a train to Slagelse St. Further information can be found on rejseplanen.dk, where the destination can be set to the bus stop 'Selandia' or Slagelse St. The walk from Slagelse St. to the venue is around 20 minutes. Food: There is a McDonald's and Burger King 2 km from the venue, and a grocery store 600 m from the venue. Accommodation: It is not possible to sleep at the venue, but there are following options: Danhostel Slagelse (1,5 km) (http://danhostel-slagelse.dk/) Hotel Frederik d.II (2,1 km) (http://www.fr2.dk/) Hotel Antvorskov (3,2 km) (http://www.hotelantvorskov.dk/en/)

name: Semey Open 2018
information: Dear competitors and guests! 1. The official opening ceremony will be held on June 7, 2018 at 7 pm. According to our idea, it will be held at the main square of the city. For the ceremony we will prepare a special show with the famous speedcubers. In this regard, we recommend arriving in the city no later than 12.00 hours on June 7. 2. The base fee allows to compete in 2x2x2 Cube, 3x3x3 Cube, Skewb, Pyraminx and Clock. For any other event you will need to pay additionally 1000 KZT per event. 3. The winner of each event will receive a prize! =========== Барлық қатысушылар мен қонақтардың назарына !!! 1. Ресми ашылу 2018 жылдың 7 маусымында сағат 19.00-де өтеді, қаланың орталық алаңында өтеді. Салтанатты ашылу рәсімі үшін атақты спидкуберлер қатысуымен шоу-бағдарлама дайындалады. Осыған байланысты біз 7-маусымда сағат 12.00-ден кешіктірмей қалаға келуді ұсынамыз. 2. Негізгі сыйақы 2x2x2 куб, 3x3x3 куб, Skewb, Pyraminx және Clock бойынша бәсекелесуге мүмкіндік береді. Кез-келген басқа іс-шараға қосымша бір оқиға үшін 1000 теңге төлеуге тура келеді. 3. Әр жарыстың жеңімпазы жүлде алады. =========== Дополнительная информация: Внимание всем участникам и гостям!!! 1. Официальная церемония открытия, состоится 7 июня 2018 года в 19.00 ч. По нашей задумке она будет проходить на главной площади города. Для церемонии будет подготовлена специальная шоу программа с участием именитых спидкуберов. В связи с этим рекомендуем прибыть в город не позднее 12.00 часов 7 июня. 2. Регистрационный взнос позволяет принять участие в дисциплинах: 2х2, Rubik's Cube, Skweb, Piraminx, Clock. Для участия в других дисциплинах необходимо оплатить дополнительный взнос по 1000 тенге за каждую дисциплину. 3. За первое место во всех дисциплинах предусмотрены призы

name: SESC Camaquã 2017
information: As inscrições poderão ser realizadas até o dia 15/08, o valor de inscrição será de R$15,00 a ser pago no dia da competição, na hora do Check-in. Por favor, caso você se inscreva mas decida não ir ao campeonato, por favor nos informe para que possamos programar corretamente a quantidade de competidores. É imprescindível ter lido as regras da WCA. O competidor poderá se inscrever em quantas modalidades desejar. Pedimos que não se inscreva nas modalidades que não possui intenção de participar. A entrada do público para assistir ao campeonato será gratuita.
venueAddress: R. Marcírio Dias Longarai, 2 - Centro, Camaquã - RS, 96180-000, Brasil

name: SESC Camaquã 2018
information: As inscrições poderão ser realizadas até o dia 15/08, o valor de inscrição será de R$20,00 a ser pago no dia da competição, na hora do Check-in. Por favor, caso você se inscreva mas decida não ir ao campeonato, por favor nos informe para que possamos programar corretamente a quantidade de competidores. É imprescindível ter lido as regras da WCA (https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/). O competidor poderá se inscrever em quantas modalidades desejar. Pedimos que não se inscreva nas modalidades que não possui intenção de participar. A entrada do público para assistir ao campeonato será gratuita. Registration ends in 08/15/2018, registration fee is R$20,00 and payment will be at Check-In for the competition. Please, if you register but decide not to come for the competition, please let us know so we can better figure out the number of competitor's to expect. Every competitor must have read WCA's Rules (https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/). The competitor can register for every event that he wants, we just ask to not register to events you're not certain at participating. Spectators entry are for free!
venueAddress: R. Marcírio Dias Longarai, 2 - Centro, Camaquã - Rio Grande do Sul, 96180-000, Brasil

name: Shijiazhuang Open 2018
information: The registration period is divided in two phases. The first phase starts at 20:00 on May 9th and ends at 23:59 on May 22th, while the second phase starts at 00:00 on May 23th and ends at 20:00 on May 30th. The registration fee includes basic entry fee and additional fee per event. The 2nd-phased registrant needs to pay the fee 0.5 time more than the early bird in the 1st phase of registration. The limitation is 160 participants, based on a first-come-first-serve rule. For Chinese domestic participants, a completed registration is online registration plus prepaid registration fee via Alipay on Cubingchina. For oversea participants, if you can't pay the fee online and your registration is not accepted antomatically, pls contact the delegate via E-mail. Then we will make a reservation for you by manually accepting your registration and you can pay the fee by cash at the venue. Please check out the competition website for registration and the other information. If you would like to cancel your registration, pls go through the registration page to do it by yourself and you will get 50% refund of the registration fee. Please keep in mind that, once you cancel the registraton, you are not able to attend the competition any more. The ending of the registration cancellation is at 00:00 on May 29th.

Before you send us your application please read important information on "Registration requirements". Регистрация будет закрыта 2 октября или когда будут одобрены первые 100 корректных заявок. Взнос за участие составляет составляет 350 рублей для любой дисциплины, каждая следующая дисциплина стоит +50 рублей. Оплата производится на чемпионате при получении бейджа участника. name: Skillcon 2016
information: This is a WCA competition presented in conjunction with SkillCon 2015. Registration fees will cover admission for SkillCon; check the [SkillCon website](http://skillcon.org/) for more info on the other events and seminars that will be going on. Saturday will be a regular competition with 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 3x3OH, 3x3BLD, Pyraminx and Skewb. Awards for these events will be presented at the end of Saturday. Registration fee for Saturday will be $35 + $5 per event. On Sunday, single rounds of 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, Megaminx, Clock, 4BLD, 5BLD and Multi-BLD will be held as qualifiers for US Nationals 2017. These will be a chance for currently non-qualified competitors to get a qualifying result in order to be eligible for these events at US Nationals 2017. Registration fee for Sunday will be $35 + $5 per event Registration at the door will cost $50 and will be limited to 3x3 speedsolve only on Saturday.
venueAddress: 3700 W. Flamingo Road Las Vegas, NV 89103

information: Palmerston North 2016 is open to competitors of all ages and ability. If you can solve the puzzle in under 10 minutes then you can enter. Entry for spectators is free for whats sure to be a fun filled day.

name: SNZ Northern 2018
information: SNZ Northern 2018 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the Rubik's Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the day on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.
venueAddress: ASB Arena Suites, ASB Baypark, 81 Truman Lane, Tauranga
venueDetails: Arena Suites within the main building

Once your payment has been reviewed, you will be moved from the waiting list into the registered list. name: Suisse Toy Fast Fingers 2017
information: Diese Speedcubing Meisterschaft, die "Suisse Toy Fast Fingers 2017" findet innerhalb der Suisse Toy 2017 in Bern statt. Die Suisse Toy ist die grösste Spielzeugmesse der Schweiz und wir dürfen voller Stolz den Leuten die Faszination unseres Sports demonstrieren. Die Startgebühren für alle Teilnehmer betragen einmalige 15Fr. Damit decken wir einen kleinen Teil der Standgebühren. In den Startgebühren ist der Eintrittspreis zur Suisse Toy nicht enthalten. Dieser muss an der Eingangskasse separat bezahlt werden. Die Suisse Toy dauern vom Donnerstag 12.Okt bis Sonntag 15. Oktober. Wenn Speedcuber an den ersten zwei Tagen am Stand mithelfen, bekommen sie den Eintritt zur Suisse Toy für die zwei Wettkampftage geschenkt. Mail an Organisator Thomas Stadler

name: Supreme South Open 2017
information: Supreme South Open 2017 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the Rubik's Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the days on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.

name: Supreme South Open 2018
information: Supreme South Open 2018 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the 3x3x3 Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the days on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.

name: Swedish Championship 2012
information: Participation fee will be 150 SEK that should be paid in advance. See the competition webpage for further details. Foreigners don't have to pay in advance. A t-shirt is included in the fee. Please go to the form on the competition page to fill in the size of shirt you want.
venueDetails: In the indoor sporting arena, next to the restaurant.

name: Swedish Championship 2013
information: Participation fee is 100SEK, which must be payed in advance. Instructions can be found on the competition webpage. Foreigners do not have to pay in advance. Also, preferred T-shirt size should be selected there. Fewest moves cannot be combined with 4x4BLD/5x5BLD since they will be run in parallel.

name: Swedish Championship 2014
information: The competition is open to everyone. Registration fee is set to 100SEK, which people living in Sweden have to pay in advance. T-shirt is included. Visit the webpage for more instructions regarding payment, accommodation and how to order food and T-shirt size etc.

name: Swedish Championship 2015
information: The competition is open to everyone. Participation fee is set to 100 SEK and must be paid for the registration to be valid (not mandatory for foreigners). For further instructions, see the competition page.
venueDetails: Main hall and lunch area, one floor down from entrance.

name: Swedish Championship 2017
information: Official Swedish Championships in all WCA events. Competitors of all nationalities are welcome. The best placed swedish competitor in each event becomes swedish champion. The participation fee has been set to 150SEK. The maximum number of participants is 150. If that is reached a waiting list will be created. Registration will close on May 19 or when the competitor limit is reached. For more information go to the competition website.

name: Swedish Championship 2018
information: Welcome to the Swedish Championship 2018! The competition is open to everyone but a competitor limit has been set to 150 competitiors due to venue constraints. Visitors are very welcome to attend this competition for free. Registration will happen on this WCA-page and is not considered complete before we have recieved the payment of the entry fee which has been set to 200 SEK. For more information, plese visit the competition website.

name: Swedish Championship 2019
information: Welcome to the Swedish Championship 2019! Everyone is welcome to compete, regardless of whether you solve the cube in 8 seconds or 5 minutes. This year will be a 4 day competition, hosting all 18 WCA events. If you are not competiting in 3x3x3 FMC, 5x5x5, 6x6x6, 7x7x7, 3x3x3 with Feet, Clock or Megaminx, there is no need to be present in Huskvarna on Thursday or Friday. Please read through all tabs on this page as they contain very useful information. Competitors of all nationalities are welcome, however only competitors representing Sweden are eligeble for medals, prize money and the Swedish Champion titles. ----- Välkomna till Svenska Mästerskapen 2019! Alla är varmt välkomna att delta, oavsett om du löser kuben på 8 sekunder eller 5 minuter. Det blir i år en 4-dagarstävling med alla 18 WCA-grenar. Om du inte tänker delta i 3x3x3 FMC, 5x5x5, 6x6x6, 7x7x7, 3x3x3 med fötterna, Clock eller Megaminx så behöver du inte vara på plats i Huskvarna under torsdagen eller fredagen. Vi ber er läsa igenom alla flikar på denna sida eftersom de innehåller mycket värdefull information. Tävlande av alla nationaliteter är välkomna, men bara deltagare som representerar Sverige kan vinna medaljer, prispengar och titeln Svensk Mästare.
venueDetails: Main room and main stage in Storparketten, side events held in Folkets Hus-rummet one floor above.

name: Swedish Decathlon Challenge 2017
information: Welcome to the last Swedish Decathlon Challenge organised in Flen, Sweden. The competition will follow the same structure as during the last competitons with competitors collecting points during the ten events. The competitor with most points over the competition will become the Swedish Decathlon Champion 2017. The competitors limit for this event is set to 80. More information about the Swedish Decathlon as well as more information about the competition and payment can be found in the competition website.
venueDetails: Stora Manschetten, on the second floor.

name: Swedish Decathlon Challenge 2018
information: Welcome to this year´s edition of the Swedish Decathlon Challenge! The competition will follow the same structure as during the last decathlons with competitors collecting points during the ten events. The competitor with most points over the competition will become the Swedish Decathlon Champion 2018. The competitors limit for this event is set to 80. More information about the Swedish Decathlon as well as more information about the competition, payment and registration can be found on the competition website. Remember that the competition will be run just as any other WCA competition where everyone are welcome to visit and participate. The decathlon challenge is considered to be unofficial.

name: Swisscubing Better Be Quick 2018
information: Pendant la pause de midi, nous allons faire des grillades. Nous comptons donc sur tous les compétiteurs d'apporter des salades, viandes ou autre (le top étant des spécialités de sa propre région) afin de le partager avec les autres compétiteurs. During lunch time we will do a big BBQ, so we hope that everyone will bring some salads, meat and other meals (the best option would be to bring specialities from your own region) in aim to share it with everyone. Während der Mittagspause werden wir grillieren. Darum hoffen wir dass alle Teilnehmer etwas zu essen mitbringen (Salat, Fleisch, Spezialität von zuhause) um es mit den anderen zu Teilen. Mentre la pausa di mezzogiorno faremo una grigliata. Speriamo che tutti porteranno delle insalate, della carne o altre cose (il meglio sono le specialità del vostro paese) da condividere con i altri concorrenti.

name: Swisscubing FMC 2017
information: Le lieu exact sera annoncé à tous les compétiteurs quelques jours avant l'évènement. ! La seule épreuve est la résolution optimisée ! ______________________________________________ The exact location will be announced to all competitors a few days before the competition. ! The only event is fewest moves !

name: Swisscubing FMC 2018
information: [DE] Achtung ! Dieser Wettbewerb ist auf das "Fewest Moves" Event fokalisiert, sei dir sicher das du die Notation kennst ! Damit wir wissen wo du teilnehmen wirst, werden wir dir nach deiner Anmeldung eine Mail senden. Bitte antworte darauf so schnell wie möglich mit dem gewünschten Austragungsort. [EN] Beware that this competition is focused on the Fewest Moves event ! Be sure to know the correct notation. After registration, a mail will be send to you asking at which location you'd like to participate. Please answer to it as quickly as possible. [FR] Attention ! Cette compétition est axée sur la discipline de résolution optimisée, sois donc sûr de connaître la notation. Après l'inscription, un mail te sera envoyé pour savoir à quel lieu tu aimerais participer. Réponds-y aussi rapidement que possible. [IT] Attenzione ! Questa gara è focalizzata sulla disciplina della risoluzione ottimizzata, quindi sia sicuro di conoscere la notazione. Dopo la registrazione ricevrai un mail per sapere dove vorresti partecipare. Per favore rispondi il più rapidamente possibile.

name: Swisscubing Mental Breakdown 2018
information: La salle exacte sera annoncée à tous les compétiteurs quelques jours avant l'évènement. Un compétiteur qui s'inscrit et ne vient pas à la compétition (sans nous l'annoncer à l'avance) devra payer des frais supplémentaires à sa prochaine compétition en Suisse. ______________________________________________ The room will be announced to all competitors a few days before the competition. A competitor who registers and doesn't show up at the competition will have to pay that registration fee at his next competition in Switzerland.

name: Swiss Nationals 2016
information: Swiss Nationals are open to citizens from all countries, but only Swiss citizens are eligible to win prizes. Entry for the Science Center is included.
venueDetails: The venue opens only at 10 am, but competitors and attendants will be allowed to enter beforehand.

name: Swiss Nationals 2017
information: Der Veranstaltungsort öffnet erst um 10 Uhr, jedoch werden Teilnehmer und Gäste vorher schon hineingelassen. Jedermann ist für den Zuttrit zu den Swiss Nationals berechtigt, jedoch können nur Schweizer Preise gewinnen. Der Eintritt zum Technorama ist inbegriffen. ___________________________________________ The venue opens only at 10 am, but competitors and attendants will be allowed to enter beforehand. Swiss Nationals is open to citizens from all countries, but only Swiss citizens are eligible to win trophies. Entry to the Science Center is included for registered guests and competitors. ___________________________________________ Le musée dans lequel a lieu la compétition ouvre seulement à 10 heures, cependant les compétiteurs et accompagnants pourront accéder à la salle plus tôt. Toute personne est autorisée à participer, mais les récompenses ne seront distribuées qu'aux compétiteurs de nationalité suisse.

name: Swiss Science Open 2018
information: [DE] Die Swiss Science Open 2018 im Technorama werden nicht nur für Teilnehmer sondern auch für alle registrierten Gäste ein Erlebnis werden. Alle Teilnehmer und registrierten Gäste erhalten für 15CHF für Sa+So freien Eintritt ins Technorama. Dort erwarten euch neben der Speedcubing Competition im Foyer ganz viele Versuche aus der Welt der Physik, welche ihr ausprobieren könnt. Registriert euch und alle eure Begleitpersonen (Gäste) um für 2 Tage den freien Eintritt ins Technorama zu bekommen. [EN] The Swiss Science Open 2018 in the Technorama will be an experience not only for participants but also for all registered guests. All participants and registered guests receive for 15CHF for Sa + Sun free admission to the Technorama. In addition to the Speedcubing Competition in the foyer, you can expect many experiments from the world of physics, which you can try out. Register yourself and all your escorts (guests) to get free admission to the Technorama for 2 days.

name: Sydney Championship 2017
information: **Date and time** Saturday 16th of December from 9am until 6pm Sunday 17th of December from 9am until 6pm **Location** Turramurra High School (MPC) 104 Maxwell Street Turramurra NSW 2074 **Registration** Entry is free for spectators. There is a $20 registration fee for competitors. Please pay using the WCA Stripe system. Your registration will not be reviewed until payment is received. You will automatically go on a waiting list until your registration has been reviewed. All registrations are manually reviewed before approving (it may take a day or two before they're reviewed).

name: Tårnby Cube Træf 2018
information: Tårnby Cube Træf er tilbage i 2018! Der vil være alle decipliner pånær 2x2, skewb og pyraminx. Deltagerprisen er inklusiv en T-shirt og generelle udgifter for konkurrencen. Det er muligt at sove på konkurrencestedet fredag- og lørdag nat. Der er en deltager grænse på 90. Siden registreringen endnu ikke er fuld, godtager vi registreringer på dagen, indtil vi når grænsen på 90 deltagere. Se registrering og betalings fanen for mere info. --- Tårnby Cube Træf is back for 2018! We will be hosting all events apart from 2x2, skewb, and pyraminx. Registration costs include a competition T-shirt and general costs toward the competition. It is possible to sleep at the venue on Friday and Saturday night. The competitor limit is 90. Since the registration has not been filled we will accept registrations on-site until we get to 90 competitors. See the registration and payment tab.

name: Techweek NZ 2017
information: Techweek NZ 2017 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the Rubik's Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the day on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.

name: The Last Frontier Open 2019
information: This will be the first ever WCA Comeptition in Alaska! Before registering, you must read the "[Competitor Responsibilities](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/TheLastFrontierOpen2019#7236-competitor-responsibilities)" tab. This tab details the responsibilites of all competitors at this competition. While registering, please read the **Registration Requirements** for this competition in order to ensure prompt registration acceptance. In accordance with [Regulation 2t](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/regulations/#2t), all competitors must be familiar with and understand the WCA Regulations. Donations: With this being the first ever WCA Competition in Alaska, there's no way to know for sure how many people will attend! All donations are appreciated and will go towards things such as venue, supplies, etc.

name: Tohoku 2018
information: 東北大会2018は，山形県初のWCA公式大会です。これまでに東北大会は仙台にて2回開催されましたが，今年は山形キューブ会([Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/rubirubi3x3x3/))が中心となって山形での開催となります。 競技は2x2x2～4x4x4，3x3x3目隠し，ピラミンクス，スキューブの6種目で，3x3x3は3ラウンド，2x2x2，4x4x4は2ラウンドの開催となります。芋煮会シーズンの山形に，ぜひお越しください。 Tohoku 2018 is the first competition in Yamagata ever. WCA competitions in Tohoku area have taken place twice in Sendai, this time Yamagata Cubing Club ([Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/rubirubi3x3x3/)) organizes in Yamagata. It has 6 events including 2x2x2, 3x3x3, 4x4x4, 3x3x3 blindfolded, Pyraminx and Skewb (3 rounds for 3x3x3 and 2 rounds for 2x2x2 and 4x4x4.) It will just the season of [Imoni](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Imoni) events in Yamagata, where you can enjoy traditional local cuisine. Let's enjoy Yamagata and cubing!

name: Tokyo Pyraminx Returns 2018
information: 東京ピラミンクスリターンズ2018は，ピラミンクス3ラウンドをメイン競技に据えた大会で，2015年に第1回，2017年に第2回が開催された「東京ピラミンクスオープン」の第3回の開催となります。 ※7月に予定されていた「東京ピラミンクスオープン2018」が台風12号の接近により中止となったため，それと同企画で開催するものとなります。 今回は，ピラミンクスのほかに3x3x3キューブ，メガミンクスを2ラウンドずつ，計3種目の開催となります。 Tokyo Pyraminx Open 2018 features 3 rounds of pyraminx event. We also have 2 events for 3x3x3 cube and Megaminx. This is a re-scheduled version of Tokyo Pyraminx open 2018 cancelled in July because of a typhoon.

name: Tolong Diam Medan 2018
information: * This is not your normal competition. If you have not competed before, you are welcome to attend, but this is not the best competition for your first experience. The competition is open to spectators at no charge. * Please be quiet. These events can require immense focus, so as the name of the competition suggests, competitors and spectators must remain quiet to ensure fair and equal conditions for all competitors. Those who continually make noise will be asked to leave without refund. * Competitors should expect to judge. Depending on the number of competitors who enter and the expected times per BLD attempt, the organisation team will schedule everyone's individual BLD attempts to give the competition a nice, clear structure. When you are not scheduled to compete (this includes FMCers), please be available to judge BLD attempts. IMPORTANT! In accordance with articles 2g, 2k, and 2l, competitors that fail to abide by the specified WCA regulations shall be disqualified, at the discretion of the WCA delegate. For further information, please send an email to [Wilson Alvis](mailto:walvisc54@gmail.com).
organiser: [{Wilson Alvis (陈智胜)}{mailto:walvis@worldcubeassociation.org}] [{Wong Chong Wen (黄崇文)}{mailto:wongchongwench@gmail.com}]
venueAddress: Jl. HOS Cokroaminoto No.8 / 6 E, Pandau Hulu I, Medan Kota, Kota Medan, Sumatera Utara 20211, Indonesia

name: Tunisia Autumn Open 2016
information: Tunisia Autumn Open 2016 is open for participants from all countries, everyone is welcome. To get to the venue, you can either take the train up to "Les Hotels" stop, it's a 20 minute walk from that station. You can take the bus, number 52A from the central station in Monastir or Sousse. This bus stops just in front of the hotel. You can go by car, follow the highway linking Monastir and Sousse. It should be known that only competitors who do check-in into the hotel can benefit from the lunch. Medals and Gifts will be awarded to the winners in each category. Competition fee is 10dt per participant

name: UCSD Summer 2017
information: * The cost of registration is a $15 flat fee. Payments are taken after registering. * Registration closes May 31st at 11:59 PM PDT; please be sure to register before then! * We will not be taking registration at the door. There is an 75 competitor limit.

name: UCSD Winter 2019
information: * The competition will take place over two days at UC San Diego's [Price Center](http://universitycenters.ucsd.edu/documents/UCen_PCFloorPlanBW.pdf). * Saturday's events will be held on the 2nd floor in Ballroom West **A**. * Sunday's events will be held in Ballroom West **B**. * Spectating is free and open to the public. Photography and videography are permitted, however there shall be **NO FLASH PHOTOGRAPHY**. * Please provide adult supervision for children under 12 years - thanks! * If any changes are made to the competition or schedule, they will be clearly announced to all competitors in an email * **Schedule is tentative to change at the discretion of the organization team** * Although this is completely optional, we ask all competitors to consider [volunteering](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/UCSDWinter2019#7665-volunteering) to judge, scramble, or run so the competition runs smoothly.
venueAddress: Price Center, UCSD, 9500 Gilman Dr, La Jolla, CA 92093

name: Uşak Open 2018
information: [TR] Kayıt sırasında adınızı ve soyadınızı lütfen kimlikte yazıldığı gibi hatasız giriniz. İlk harfleri büyük yazınız. Yarışmaya gelirken yanınızda kimlik bulundurmayı unutmayınız. Katılım ücreti için internet üzerinden başvuru yapıldıktan sonra i.kuleli@gmail.com adresine mail atarak belirtiniz. Katılımcı limiti dolmadan önce ödemeyi yapmanız gerekmektedir. İnternet üzerinden ödenecek ücret 50 TL'dir. Gerekli bilgiler mailde verilecektir. 21 Ekim'e kadar iptal durumunda katılım ücreti iadesi yapılacaktır, sonrasında ücret iadesi yoktur. Online ödeme yapanlar yarışma listesinde önceliklidir. Yarışma günü kayıt masasında ücret ödeyecekler, katılımcı sınırı dolmadığı takdirde girişte 70 TL ödeyeceklerdir. [EN] Please enter your name and surname during registration as it is writter on your ID. The First letters are capital letters. Dont forget to have an ID card with you when you come to the competition. Please send an e-mail to i.kuleli@gmail.com for the registration fee on the internet, after registered on WCA. Pay as soon as possible after you register, otherwise the limit can be reached and you will not be able to compete. The fee to be paid over the internet is 50 TL. The necessary information will be given in the mail. In case of cancellation up to October 21st, registration fees will be refunded. After 21st the fee will not be refunded. Online payers have priority in the competition list. Unless the competitor limit reached, those who pay the registration fee on the day of the competition will pay 70 TL.

name: Uzbekistan Open 2017
information: Registration is full now. You can still register, but you will be placed on a waiting list and you can only compete if other people cancel. So your chances are small. ================== This is the first WCA competition in Uzbekistan. We hope after this competition many more will follow. Around 1-2 weeks before the competition you will receive an email to confirm your participation. Please make sure to check your mailbox and spam box around that time. If you do not confirm, then you will removed from the list of competitors. You can pay the registration fee on-site in the venue. ========== Это первые соревнования WCA в Узбекистане. Мы надеемся, что после этого соревнования последуют много других. Примерно за 1-2 недели до начала соревнования вы получите электронное письмо, чтобы подтвердить свое участие. Обязательно проверяйте свой почтовый ящик и спам за 1-2 недели до соревнований. Если участие не будет подтверждено то участник будет удален из списка конкурсантов. Вы можете оплатить регистрационный сбор на месте в месте проведения. ========== Bu Uzbekistondagi birinchi WCA musobaqalari. Umid qilamiz-ki, bu musobaqadan keyin, boshqa koplab musobaqlar amalga oshiriladi. Ishtirokingizni tasdiqlash uchun musobaqadan 1-2 hafta oldin elektron pochta olasiz. Musoboqadan 1-2 hafta oldin pochtangizni va spam papkasini tekshirib turing. Ishtirokchi qatnashishini tasdiqlamasa, qatnashuvchilar ro'yxatidan o'chiriladi. Ro'yhatga olish narxini musbaqa bo'ladigan joyda to'lashingiz mumkin.

Registration form is [here](http://ca.cubingusa.com/virginiaopen2010/#name).

name: Virginia Open Fall 2014
information: Registration is a flat fee of $15 (non-refundable), and must be paid on the competition website via PayPal. Registration closes on October 16. Registration at the door on the day of the competition will cost $25.

name: Virginia Open Fall 2015
information: The registration fee for competitors is a flat fee of $15 for all competitors. Registration must be paid via PayPal. For your registration to be complete, you must submit your registration fee via PayPal by Wednesday, November 4 at 11:59 PM EDT. Registration will be accepted on the morning of the competition, in which case registration fees will increase to $25. We reserve the right to limit the number of events for compettitors who register on the day of the competition.

name: Virginia Open Spring 2015
information: Registration is a flat fee of $15 (non-refundable), and must be paid on the competition website via PayPal. Registration closes on April 8. Registration at the door on the day of the competition will cost $20.

name: Virginia Open Spring 2016
information: This competition is free for all spectators, as well as competitors who are University of Virginia students, faculty, or staff. The registration fee for competitors is a flat fee of $15 for all competitors. For your registration to be considered complete and for your name to appear on the competitors list, the payment must be paid via PayPal. This competition is only open to the first 100 competitors. Registration will close either when the number of registered competitors hits 100 or on March 30 at 11:59PM. No new registrations will be accepted on the day of the competition.
venueDetails: Ern Commons is the building located between the Balz-Dobie and Watson-Webb dorms.

name: Virginia Open Spring 2017
information: Registration is a flat fee of $15 (non-refundable), and must be paid on the competition website via PayPal. There is a 100 person competitor limit with no at-the-door registration. Registration closes on March 30.

name: Virginia Open Winter 2017
information: The registration fee is $15. There is a 100 person competitor limit with no at-the-door registration. To register, please follow all Instructions on the registration payment tab. Inproper completion of these steps may result in a delay of Registration. If you do not see your name on the compeitors tab after 48 hours of registering, please contact me to resolve the issue. The event list consists of: Rubik's Cube, 2x2, Blindfolded, One-Handed, Megaminx, and Clock.

name: Virtual Cubing 2019
information: This competition is only the start of the vibrant and active cubing community for the Omaha area! Omaha Virtual School is Nebraska's first blended learning community! We are a resource for our community so that all families can reach their educational and social goals. In comes, Virtual Cubing! The Omaha community is full of talented cubing enthusiasts, but we lack competitions! We, at Omaha Virtual School, hope to fill that void!! New competetors are encouraged to compete! There are plenty of us there to help you learn the ropes! You are also welcome to just come and watch! It's pretty incredible!
venueDetails: The competition will be in the basement of the building. Food will be served upstairs.

name: Virudhunagar KCET Cube Open 2018
information: There is on-spot registration. **Steps to register on spot:** Spot registration will be open from 8:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m. on the day of competition for events that haven't started by the time you register. Note: There will be no spot registration if online registration reaches 100 participants. Also, spot registration will be closed once the total registration reaches 100. Please bring your ID cards for identification at the college gate. Online Registration closes on July 12, 2018, 11:59 PM IST.
venueAddress: S.P.G.Chidambara Nadar – C.Nagammal Campus, S.P.G.C.Nagar, K.Vellakulam - 625 701 Near Virudhunagar.

name: Visayas Championship 2016

Payment-first system shall be implemented before WCA registrations can be approved and included on the official list of registered participants. For participants from the Visayas region who are currently studying, kindly indicate on the comment section the current school institution that you will be representing. Mini 3x3x3 Cubes will be given away to the first 35 Registrants. Registration closes on July 17, 2016 so please pre-register and settle your payments on or before that date. Strictly no walk-in registrations on the day of the event.

name: Welcome to 2019
information: With the competition happening over New Years, we strongly recommend that you sleep at the hotel that the competition is located in. This is due to the fact that New Years is one of the riskiest nights in regards to drunk driving. You can either get yourself a private room or split the room with other competitors. For more information on the rooms we have reserved for competitors and private rooms, please refer to the "[Hotel Information + FAQ](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/competitions/Welcometo2019#8093-hotel-information-faq)" Tab. Thank you to [Jason White](https://www.worldcubeassociation.org/persons/2016WHIT16) for coming up with this competition idea!

name: Wellington Winter 2018
information: Wellington Winter 2018 is an official World Cube Association (WCA) sanctioned speedcubing competition. Speedcubing is solving the Rubik's Cube or other similar puzzles as quickly as possible. The competition is open to all competitors regardless of experience and skill, but certain event-based time limits will be in place so as to make sure we can stay on schedule and get through the day on time. No prior experience in WCA competitions is necessary, but competitors should be familiar with the WCA regulations.
venueAddress: 72 Kemp St, Kilbirnie, Wellington 6022, New Zealand

information: Registration opens on Friday 1st September, 7pm BST. The steps for registration are as follows: * Login with your WCA account, or create an account in the top-right. * Register for the competition on the left. * Once you receive an email and are on the waiting list, pay the fee on the [UKCA website](http://www.ukca.org/competitions/upcoming-competitions/weston-super-mare-open-2017/registration). * Once we have confirmed correct payment, we will accept your registration. This fee is non-refundable, as it represents a commitment to attending the competition. If you can no longer make it, please inform us as soon as possible so we can give the place to someone else.
